title: Magnetohydrodynamics
alt: Magnetohydrodynamics combines the intuitive nature of Maxwell's equations with the easy solvability of the Navier-Stokes equations. It's so straightforward physicists add "relativistic" or "quantum" just to keep it from getting boring.
transcript:
[Ponytail holding her hands up is facing Cueball and Megan .]
Ponytail: The Sun's atmosphere is a superhot plasma governed by magnetohydrodynamic forces...
Cueball: Ah, yes, of course.[Caption below the panel:]
Whenever I hear the word "magnetohydrodynamic" my brain just replaces it with "magic."
